mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LOVE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PNO = #{pNo}
mapper.select: SELECT L.*, PI.PRENAMEDNAME "PRENAMEDNAME", PO.PCONTENT, PO.PDATE FROM (SELECT LO.*, M.NICKNAME FROM LOVE LO JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_ID=LO.MEMBER_ID) WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id}) L JOIN PICTURE PI ON(PI.PNO = L.PNO) JOIN POST PO ON(PO.PNO = PI.PNO) WHERE PI.PLEVEL = 0 ORDER BY L.LNO DESC

SELECT A.BNO, A.RNAME, SUBSTR(A.ADDRESS, 1, 7) "ADDRESS", NAME.PRENAMEDNAME FROM (SELECT B.*, R.RNAME, R.ADDRESS FROM ( SELECT BO.BNO, BO.RNO, BO.MEMBER_ID FROM BOOKMARK BO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY BNO DESC) B JOIN RESTAURANT R ON(R.RNO=B.RNO)) A left JOIN (SELECT PC.*, P.RNO FROM( SELECT PRENAMEDNAME,PNO FROM PICTURE WHERE PLEVEL=0) PC JOIN POST P ON(P.PNO=PC.PNO) JOIN (SELECT MIN(PNO) "PNO", RNO FROM POST GROUP BY RNO) MINPOST ON(MINPOST.PNO=PC.PNO) )NAME ON(NAME.RNO=A.RNO)
